landing.tagline: Transform your habits, track your progress.
landing.heroHeadline: Build Better Habits, Track Your Progress
landing.heroDescription: Join thousands of users transforming their lives. Solivra helps you build powerful habits, maintain streaks, and achieve your goals with intelligent tracking and motivation.
landing.noCardRequired: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ Start tracking immediately ‚Ä¢ Free forever
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to build and maintain powerful habits
landing.feature1Description: Track multiple habits simultaneously with detailed insights and progress visualizations to keep you motivated.
landing.feature2Description: Build unstoppable streaks with reminders and notifications designed to keep you on track every single day.
landing.feature3Description: Understand your patterns with beautiful charts and deep analytics to optimize your habit-building journey.
landing.feature4Description: Set meaningful goals and watch as you systematically achieve them with structured habit tracking.
landing.feature5Description: Unlock achievements and celebrate milestones as you progress through your habit-building journey.
landing.feature6Description: Access Solivra on any device. Seamlessly sync your habits across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who are already building amazing habits with Solivra. Start your journey today.
landing.footerTagline: Transform your habits, track your progress, achieve your goals.

guide.title: User Guide
guide.welcomeDescription: This app helps you understand and track your habits, supporting your journey toward self-improvement.
guide.feature1Description: See your clean time ticking, longest records, and quick access to log a relapse.
guide.feature2Description: Record not just 'when', but also 'why'‚Äîadd notes and adjust times if you forgot to log earlier.
guide.feature3Description: Visualize your progress with complete stats and a calendar highlighting relapse patterns.
guide.shortcutsDescription: Navigate and use the app faster with keyboard shortcuts. Press '?' anytime to see the full list.

error.404: The page you're looking for was not found. Perhaps the URL is mistyped?
error.500: A critical error occurred on our server. We're fixing it!
error.401: You don't have permission‚Äîmaybe you need to sign in first.
error.403: Access denied. You don't have rights to view this page.
error.408: Your request took too long. Check your connection and try again.
error.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again shortly.
